Value: A modern web application for customizing skateboards and minting them as NFTs on the Solana blockchain. Built with Next.js, featuring 3D visualization, real-time customization, and seamless NFT creation.
Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Three.js, React Three Fiber, GSAP, Convex, Prismic, Solana Web3.js, Metaplex SDK, Civic Auth, NFT.Storage, GitHub API, Octokit
3D Skateboard Customization, NFT Minting on Solana, User Authentication via Civic, Profile Management, Responsive Design, CMS Integration with Prismic, Asset Storage on GitHub, Real-time Updates
